name: Attack of the Zombees!
description:
(Psst, wait a few seconds for it to load and use fullscreen!)

OBJECTIVE

--Defend your hive from vicious hordes of "zombees" (yes, this game was literally founded on a pun) in this fast-paced sting-em-up.

CONTROLS

--Mash W to flit around and above enemies, and hold S to build up downwards momentum to smite zombees with your powerful stinger.

--Use the spacebar to shoot honey balls that slow enemies and knock them downwards into safe stinging range.

MULTIPLE MODES

--Check out both the single-player and 2-player co-op modes, each with five escalating waves and an epic conclusion.

--Build up your bee with unique upgrades in-between waves.

PUN WARNING

--Warning: contains an excessive and potentially hazardous number of bee puns.

CREDITS

--Made by Jacob Idec, Jonathan Kwee, and Patrick Niyaongabo for the game development course of Hendrix College.
